scripts.patch:gas: yarn version --patch && yarn deploy:gas && yarn push
scripts.minor:gas: yarn version --minor && yarn deploy:gas && yarn push
scripts.major:gas: yarn version --major && yarn deploy:gas && yarn push
scripts.patch:gcf: yarn version --patch && yarn deploy:gcf && yarn push
scripts.minor:gcf: yarn version --minor && yarn deploy:gcf && yarn push
scripts.major:gcf: yarn version --major && yarn deploy:gcf && yarn push
scripts.push: git push && git push --tags && echo "Successfully released version $npm_package_version!"
